name: restaurant-app-monorepo
description: Restaurant Management System - Monorepo with Backend (NestJS) and Frontend (Next.js)

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd src && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=restaurant-backend && npm run build --workspace=restaurant-frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=restaurant-backend && npm run lint --workspace=restaurant-frontend
